itunes:title: Episode 1116 - The Man Who Impregnated 100 Women
title: Episode 1116 - The Man Who Impregnated 100 Women
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
America’s most prominent sperm donor, Ari Nagel aka The Sperminator aka America’s Dad, joins the show to talk about what it’s like to have over 100 children, how he goes about his donation process, the most kids he’s had in a day/month/year, and when he’ll finally stop fathering children.
